Key Match Events: Hardik Pandya scored a half-century off 27 balls
Najmul Hossain Shanto made 40 runs before being caught by Arshdeep Singh
Post-Match Reflections: India continue their unbeaten run in the Super Eights phase
Bangladesh knew they needed a win to continue their progress in the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: India reached 196/5, with Bangladesh making 146/8 in their response
Others: India outplayed Bangladesh with a clinical win to make it two wins out of two in the Super Eight phase
Tanzim Hasan Sakib took two wickets for Bangladesh, while Kuldeep Yadav took three
